name: Beauty Salon 3D!
description:
Congrats, you have your own beauty salon!
Time to give some faces a professional makeover - foundation, eyeshadow, lipstick, acrylic colors.

It’s up to you to makeover customers with your art and gives your clients the ultimate face spa experience. Think you’re done? Nah, we’re taking makeup to the next level. You can choose from all kinds of prints and paints to polish your clients’ eyeshadows and lips.

It is the most realistic beauty game you've ever seen.
